bloodBath_bloodBank_structure.description: bloodBank v2.0 directory structure for unified pump data management

raw/.description: Raw pump data organized by type and serial number

subdirectories.cgm/: CGM readings organized by pump serial
subdirectories.basal/: Basal rate data organized by pump serial
subdirectories.bolus/: Bolus/meal data organized by pump serial

merged/.description: Processed LSTM sequences ready for ML training
